How many people are affected by osteoporosis-pseudoglioma syndrome ?,Osteoporosis-pseudoglioma syndrome is a rare disorder that occurs in approximately 1 in 2 million people.,GHR,osteoporosis-pseudoglioma syndrome
What are the genetic changes related to osteoporosis-pseudoglioma syndrome ?,"Osteoporosis-pseudoglioma syndrome is caused by mutations in the LRP5 g
